title: Error Occurs When Adding a Filter to a Computed Boolean Column
description: When attempting to add a filter to a boolean computed column, an error is encountered.
OB: When trying to add a filter to a boolean computed column, an error occurs.
EB: Adding a filter to a boolean computed column should not result in an error.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new BIRT sample data source and a dataset from the 'orders' table.
2. Create a computed column with the name 'yes/no', type 'any' (no boolean option for selection), and value 'if(row[1]%2==0){true;}else{false;}'.
3. Drag the dataset from the Data Explorer to the Layout.
4. Select the table, then click the 'Filters' tab in the Property Editor.
5. Click the 'Add' button.
6. Select 'yes/no' as the Expression and 'Is True' as the Operator.
